attributes.action: Susbsidise people on water meters where they are having to clean tins etc for local recycling schemes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have recently moved in to a new property where the water is metered. I have received a flyer from the council urging me to recycle my household waste - however all can, bottles etc must be rinsed out prior placing them in the correct wheeled bin.  I would love to recycle but the additional cost of water, plus the wastage of water, is detering me.
